ProductInfo.Features:
Save time on installation! These BNC + Power cables allows you to connect your digital video recorder and CCTV security cameras without the need for a costly additional power cable.
It comes in a 98-foot length (30 meters) with video (BNC) and 2.1 mm power connectors on each end and transmits video signal and power at the same time.
For a better video quality provides these cables low interference and low noise. You can run your camera further without any loss of signal.
ProductInfo.Name: L2go 4x30m 100ft CCTV Camera DVR Video Power Security Surveillance BNC RCA Stecker Extension Coaxial Cable Wire
